steps: Fry the meat in a pan
Cut the vegetables
Put the fried meat on the bottom part of the bread
Apply som barbecue sauce
Add the vegetables and apply the top part of the bread
recipes.name: Hamburger

steps: Put the dough on a lightly floured worktop and divide it into four equal pieces. Roll each piece into round balls. Sprinkle some flour over it and cover with a cloth. The subjects must now rest for 20 minutes.
Spread tomato sauce on the bases before placing the mozzarella on top
Bake the pizza at 250 degrees for minutes, or until the pizza has a golden color and a crispy bottom.
Warm the oven to 250 degrees
Bake the pizza for 10 minutes, or until the pizza has acquired a golden color and a crispy base.
recipes.name: Pizza

steps: Spread cream cheese on the two slices
Add the slices of roastbeef to one of the slices
Put the other slice on top
Cut the sandwich in half diagonally
recipes.name: Sandwich

steps: Boil water in a pot, and add rice when the water is boiling
Fry the chicken in a pan
Add the tikka masala paste to the chicken when fried
Add the onion to the pan and let it cook in the sauce
recipes.name: Tikka Masala

steps: Cut the bacon into cubes and fry them in a medium hot frying pan until golden.
Boil up water and add the spagetti. Let the spagetti cook in boiling water for 5 minutes.
Whisk together whole eggs
Pour cooked pasta into the pan with the meat. Remove the pan from the heat and fold in the egg mixture
Enjoy!
recipes.name: Pasta

steps: Cut the tuna in thin slices.
Press out the lemon juice and blend it with the soy sauce
Dip the tuna slices in the sauce and enjoy the tuna sashimi
recipes.name: Bluefin Tuna

steps: Cut the salmon fillet in half down the middle. Place the fillets with the skin side down in a form or long pan. Mix together sugar and salt and rub the fish with the mixture.
Sprinkle white pepper and dill over the fish and drizzle over grape spirit.
Place one part over the other and cover the fish with plastic wrap
Put the salomon in the fridge for 3 days
Pour off the sheet and let the fish dry
recipes.name: Salomon

steps: Cut the meat into cubes and put it in a bowl

Chop the onion and garlic and put it in the bowl together with lemon juice. Mix everything well, so that the meat is covered with marinade. Set cold. Turn the meat a couple of times while it marinates.
Take the meat out of the marinade and thread the pieces onto barbecue skewers together with the super stat onions.
Grill the meat for approximately 5 minutes on each side.
recipes.name: Kebab

steps: Cut up the vegetables into small pieces
Fry the meat in a pan
Add the spicemix to the meat, and let the meat reast for a couple of minutes
Warm the tortillas in the microwave oven
Blend all the ingredients in the tortillas and enjoy the taco
recipes.name: Taco
